about_the_game:
Monster Shuttle is a fun and relaxing 2D puzzle game where players take on the role of piloting a personalized "Monster Shuttle," tasked with safely delivering adorable space monsters back to their homes. You'll navigate through various cosmic obstacles and cleverly use the shuttle's ability to change sizes to transport the little monsters to their designated destinations.

But it's not an easy ride—each level requires players to manage the order in which the monsters board the shuttle and how they are arranged inside to ensure the shuttle can smoothly pass through obstacles and interact with other strange creatures in space. The monsters each have their own unique personalities—some need to be stacked, while others prefer to take up more space. Players must skillfully adjust the monsters' positions and efficiently use the shuttle's space to complete each mission.

Whether you're a fan of puzzle games or just looking for a relaxing experience, Monster Shuttle offers a uniquely irresistible cosmic adventure for everyone!
